about_the_game: The Demo of "The Great War of Jorth" contains several hours of gameplay and provides players with an introduction to our world. Please enjoy and give us any feedback that you would like. Like the full game our Demo comes fully voiced with partial controller support.

content_descriptors.notes: Our game includes references to mature content as well as some brief cartoon nudity.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium®4 1.5GHz

  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution in High Color mode.

short_description: The Great War of Jorth (GWOJ) has the look and sound of a classic 16-bit JRPG. It will satisfy the nostalgic itch of any gamer that remembers playing the greats of the 16-bit era. Our fully voiced game will immerse you in a rich story where the outcome is determined by your choices.
